dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3710 IH: Javits Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Vel√°zquez (for herself, Ms. Clarke of New York, Ms. Jayapal, Mr. Grijalva, Ms. Jackson Lee, Mr. Cohen, Mr. McGovern, Mr. Evans, Mr. Ellison, Mr. Sean Patrick Maloney of New York, Ms. Norton, and Mr. Khanna) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To reauthorize appropriations for the Jacob K. Javits Fellowship Program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Javits Act of 2017.
Section 705 of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1134d) is amended by striking 2009 and inserting 2018.

The Secretary of Education shall ensure that music education is included among the fields of study for which a fellowship may be awarded under subpart 1 of part A of title VII of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1134 et seq.).
